about_the_game:
This artbook details the creation of the bizarre world of Gori: Cuddly Carnage and the adventures of those who inhabit it. Learn about the small indie team for Sweden and how they took art from concept sketches all the way through to a finished game.

This artbook contains :
- 69 pages
- Concept art and Never before seen prototype drafts of the games characters, enemies and environments
- Notes from the developers on how they came up with the ideas for everything in the game, and their iterative design process.
- Comic book reel cutscenes as displayed in the game
- Cute cats and terrifying unicorns.

name: Gori: Cuddly Carnage - Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: PDF Reader Required

short_description: This artbook details the creation of the bizzare world of Gori: Cuddly Carnage and the adventures of those who inhabit it. Learn about the small indie team for Sweden and how they took art from concept sketches all the way through to a finished game.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
